text: Blur  logic has been updated and adapted to the "kneel" methodology from Muzei. If blur is on, default is to show background as blurred, tap to clarify, (replay gif, if needed), then duck back down to blurred again when done.
i have some use cases to test (like animation + animation + visibility changes)
but i think we'll be able to iron them out faster when everyone's testing at the same time
i like the term kneel cause in audio its "duck"
